page.title: 18'BUNCH' JONES
page.content: {"Bunch" Jones}is a lovely old lady who was{born in Lower Darnford}farm house and lived there until she was twelve. She came back to visit the farm so we could talk to her about her life.We wrote her a letter of thanks:- {Dear Mrs Jones, I hope you enjoyed your day on the farm .I wonder if you are sad that the farm has changed over the years.Did you eat a lot of carrots when you were young because your eyes sparkle?I imagine you with long blonde hair,blue eyes and very pretty. I would not get to sleep with all the animals making noises.You were not what I expected.I thought you would need a walking stick and have loads of wrinkles but you didn't. Love from {Donna and Caroline
